parameters.name: FilePath
parameters.description: Full local path name of the *.sldsettings file to load

title: ISldWorks.LoadAdminSettingsFile
description: Loads the specified *.sldsettings file into SOLIDWORKS Design Augmented.

parameters.name: FilePath
parameters.description: Full local path name of the *.sldsettings file to load

returns: True if settings successfully applied, false if not
remarks:
The 3DEXPERIENCE platform Admin authors the
*.sldsettings
platform file with settings appropriate for SOLIDWORKS Design Augmented. At launch, SOLIDWORKS Design Augmented reads a local copy. This method is used primarily by the 3DEXPERIENCE Add-in.
